title: "Understanding interfaces of hybrid materials with machine learning"
excerpt: "Using machine learning methods, researchers at TU Graz can predict the structure formation of functionalized molecules at the interfaces of hybrid materials. Now they have also succeeded in looking behind the driving forces of this structure formation."
